channel.title: How Can I Change My PK Name
channel.description:
You Know On Servers Such Has Pimpscape..
They Have The Skull Then Pimp Underneath,
What Would I Need To Edit To Get That To Change To Campkz?
Thanks Anyways

item.title: How Can I Change My PK Name
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Okie Dokie Thanks Peeps

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Change My PK Name

item.title: How Can I Change My PK Name
item.dc:creator: @wooker wooker
item.description:
@wooker wrote:

Ctrl + H put in the find box pimp or phone or whatever is under the skeleton, in the repalce with box, type whatever you want to have… Hit replace all and bom, every pimp is replaced with your name or w/e

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Change My PK Name

item.title: How Can I Change My PK Name
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

client.java search for (“pimp”) change the pimp to what u want and btw the (“pimp”) might be (@blue@“pimp”) or what ever dont do much with pk severs hope this helped

~SoulJah~

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Change My PK Name

item.title: How Can I Change My PK Name
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

or if u want to pimp ur source search in client.java for that name and change everyone of the names to urs

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Change My PK Name

item.title: How Can I Change My PK Name
item.dc:creator: @Angel_of_grim Angel of grim
item.description:
@Angel_of_grim wrote:

go to your client.java and search for @red@Pimpscape or Phonescape depeneding on the source, where it says pimpscape change that to your server name.

Read full topic
